actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-697.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S. 1193) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1982 and 1983 for the Department of State, the International Communication Agency, and the Board for International Broadcasting, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 1193 (Department of State funding).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S. 1193) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1982 and 1983 for the Department of State, the International Communication Agency, and the Board for International Broadcasting, and for other purposes.
